name: Grab&Run
description:
Grab&Run Go through puzzles and action to grab what you need or drag a box to unlock the door. It's not easy, it's challenging! >For: Windows only >Needed Space : 6 mb >Language : English>Controls: >Move: arrow keys, >Boost: l-ctrl >Go back to the main menu : M Focus of the Game >Collect all the zemralds (red crystals) in a room without dying.But be careful! It won't be easy.... (There are 2 types of enemies. So... be careful) News! >I have a Tumblr blog to inform everyone! Please check it out: udcgame.tumblr.com Mechanics 1-Credits to everyone who gave feedback!! 2-A main menu 3-Musics 4-Enemies (3 types) 5-A good shop system. Shop has only 1 upgrade though. 6-A working boost mechanic 7-12 levels to understand what will game be. 8-Traps! They kill you if you step on them! Be careful. 9-Cleaners! They move vertically and nowhere is safe now Q&A

Q:Can i make a video about it?

A: Yes.

Q:Nice soundtrack. can i download it or use it?

A:No

Q:How can i follow you?

tumblr: udcgame.tumblr.com
